# Dynatrace Oneagent Overview

- server  apm 

  - agent
    - agent autoinject, [ld.so](https://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man8/ld.so.8.html)
    - agents
      - javaagent
      - phpagent
      - nginx
      - apache
      - golang
  - extensions
    - python extensions, load by ruxit engine
    - jmx extensions, load by javaagent
